Class PlaneSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • SpriteSheet
              • PlaneSprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

    public class PlaneSprite
extends SpriteSheet
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.KeyListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener
    This is the PlaneSprite class and will manage the PlaneSprite properties. This class can move the plane, shoot missles, draw the plane, etc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
